description.description: A brief description of the company

note.description: Any notes or comments regarding the company

domains.description: List of domains associated with the company

created_at.description: The date and time when the company's record was initially created

updated_at.description: The date and time when the company's record was last updated

custom_fields.description: Any custom fields or data associated with the company

health_score.description: The health score of the company based on various metrics

account_tier.description: The tier of the company's account (e.g., Free, Pro, Enterprise)

renewal_date.description: The date when the company's account is due for renewal

industry.description: The industry to which the company belongs
